author: Kim Lyons
title: FDA approves Battelle’s process to decontaminate N95 face masks but limits it to 10,000 per day
description: The FDA approved the limited use of a process that would clean much-needed N95 protective face masks and allow them to be reused safely. Ohio- based Battelle uses a “vapor phase hydrogen peroxide” process to decontaminate the masks being used by healthcare pr…
content:
The Ohio company says its process could decontaminate 80,000 masks per day
Photo by James Black/Icon Sportswire via Getty Images
The Food and Drug Administration has approved the limited use of a process that would clean much-needed N95 protective face mask… [+1702 chars]
